title: William Afton

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Murder someone
-Stuff a dead player into a robotic suit

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You may only use your second ability on players you have killed
-Players you stuff into an animatronic suit will control an NPC named after one of the four respective FNAF 1 animatronics (Freddy, Chica, Bonnie, Foxy)
-Players you stuff into an animatronic will get the role Animatronic (3373.5)
-Only a max of 4 animatronics may exist at a time. You can still kill people though

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose you, or stuff them into a robotic bear suit

desc:
Post 3373
_Lost to this monster. To the man behind the slaughter_
